wikipedia_page.main: John Granville Liggins (26 March 1906 – 1976) was an English-born footballer who played as a centre forward. He played in The Football League for Leicester City and Burnley.In the 1934–35 season he scored four league goals for Leicester.

response: Footballer Jack Liggins was born here in 1906. The Lancashire and England Test cricketer Paul Allott was born in Altrincham.
